channel.title: Abortion
channel.description:
So i heard this was a hot topic to discuss, i even asked my mum what her views on it were and she said that its like killing a human being if you get an abortion... Utter crap i said. The people who are against abortion [b]must[/b] be against sex then, because everytime a man ejaculates it releases millions of sperm cells.... which are usually killed in the condom! So they must be against: Sex, Condoms, abortion.
So people are worried about killing one small life form, when nearly all people are killing small life forms.. in the condom, i mean even when you walk about in ure carpet there are tiny life forms that you are killing by stepping on them....
So i ask your views on abortion....

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:9, topic:94527”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=136859.msg1319386#msg1319386 date=1179180839]

I thought sperm lived for 5 days

I think abortion should be allowed because sex is funner without condoms.

ever heard of the pill? or other forms of not getting pregnant? lol.
And i was talking to my friend in class today who got an abortion a few months ago and she said she regrets it, but didnt feel strongly against it at the time.
[/quote]Well why didn’t she use “the pill”? “The pill” probably has some gay side effects also.[/quote]

Hopefully it will work like steroids and make her more manly.

Read full topic

@xxbestxx wrote:

well, we had this duscestion today in civics, and we started our own third party. and we had to make a platform, and one of my planks were abortion. i think that it shouldn’t be aloud after 3 months. i kno sex is fun, but u have to be careful.

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Ehh… There’s huge difference between a human being and sperm, don’t you think? A human being can live for long, sperm cell for 10 seconds. If you’d want to be a good person and not to kill anything or anyone then you couldn’t live since you eat, you skill, you walk, you kill ants. Who cares if ants die, the important thing is that humans survive. Every race cares for their own good. frank_ and Dawn you freaking racists lol.

Read full topic

So i heard this was a hot topic to discuss, i even asked my mum what her views on it were and she said that its like killing a human being if you get an abortion…

abortion.

So people are worried about killing one small life form, when nearly all people are killing small life forms… in the condom, i mean even when you walk about in ure carpet there are tiny life forms that you are killing by stepping on them…
